name: Crop Receipts
overview: Watch a 20-second tutorial video! NOTE: There is a very important number at the top of each receipt, like **M1424-221**. Make *sure* that number is included when you crop the receipt.

questions.text: Crop the *entire* individual receipt (including EVERYTHING, like the hand-written number, the store name and address, etc.) and click the camera icon.
questions.smsText: Crop the *entire* individual receipt (including EVERYTHING, like the hand-written number, the store name and address, etc.) and click the camera icon. (1=Then rotate it if necessary!)

choices.text: No issues, new images are rotated and include the handwritten ID, store address, etc.
Receipts overlapped so badly that key information was covered

questions.smsText: Any problems? (1=No issues, new images are rotated and include the handwritten ID, store address, etc.,2=No receipts on this page,3=Receipts overlapped so badly that key information was covered)
